item.title: Oneok 将出售债券帮助支付 EnLink 和中游股份的费用
item.description: Oneok Inc. 计划在本周二出售投资级债券，而在此之前不到两周，这家管道公司表示将收购一家竞争对手和另一家公司的控股权，交易总价值达 59 亿美元。【原文：Oneok Inc. is planning to sell investment-grade bonds on Tuesday, less than two weeks after the pipeline company said it was buying a competitor and a controlling stake in a different company in transactions valued at a combined $5.9 billion.】

item.title: 大麻公司卖啤酒比卖大麻更赚钱
item.description: 事实证明，Tilray Brands Inc. 对合法大麻的豪赌过于乐观，它现在只能依赖于它曾经想要颠覆的酒类市场。【原文：Tilray Brands Inc.’s big bet on legal cannabis is proving so overoptimistic it is now relying on the alcohol market it once aimed to disrupt.】

item.title: 南非新债券在每周拍卖会上吸引五倍需求
item.description: 南非通过出售新债券筹集了 11 亿美元，在每周一次的拍卖会上，对这些债券的需求十分旺盛。【原文：South Africa raised $1.1 billion from a sale of new bonds, which saw strong demand at its weekly auction.】

item.title: 印度曼尼普尔暴力事件后互联网被封锁五天
item.description: 印度东北部边境的曼尼普尔邦在种族暴力事件造成数人死亡的情况下，对互联网服务实施了为期五天的禁令，以防止错误信息的传播。【原文：India’s northeastern border state of Manipur imposed a ban on internet services for five days to prevent the spread of misinformation amid ethnic violence that has claimed several lives.】

item.title: Petroperu 董事会辞职，流动资金持续紧张
item.description: 濒临破产的国有企业秘鲁石油公司（Petroleos del Peru）董事会周二提交了辞呈。【原文：The board of ailing state-owned company Petroleos del Peru submitted its resignation on Tuesday.】

item.title: 南非国家公路需要超过 170 亿美元的修缮费用
item.description: 南非已经面临着升级港口、铁路和电力基础设施的巨额开支，还需要 3 070 亿兰特（172 亿美元）来修复和改善其庞大的国家公路系统。【原文：South Africa, which already faces a heavy bill to upgrade its port, rail and electricity infrastructure, needs 307 billion rand ($17.2 billion) to repair and improve its sprawling national road system.】

item.title: 汉普顿餐厅拥护价值 85 万美元的工人公寓计划
item.description: 在又一个繁忙的夏季结束之际，汉普顿的餐馆和其他企业都在努力解决一个将延续到下一个夏季的问题：如何在世界上最昂贵的房地产市场之一保持员工就近工作。【原文：As they close the books on another busy summer, Hamptons restaurants and other businesses are wrestling with a problem that will carry into the next: how to keep staff close at hand in one of the world’s most expensive real estate markets.】

item.title: Glean Value 与 DST、软银共同完成 46 亿美元融资
item.description: Glean Technologies Inc.融资超过 2.6 亿美元，估值比年初翻了一番多，达到 46 亿美元，并表示将利用这笔资金建立企业人工智能平台并进行全球扩张。【原文：Glean Technologies Inc. raised over $260 million, more than doubling its valuation from earlier in the year to $4.6 billion, and said it will use the funds to build up its enterprise AI platform and expand globally.】

item.title: 国泰君安、银河基金在资金外流加剧之际推出加密货币挂钩 ETF
item.description: 即使投资者从现货比特币基金撤出，道富环球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）和银河资产管理公司（Galaxy Asset Management）仍将推出三只以加密货币为重点的交易所交易基金。【原文：State Street Global Advisors and Galaxy Asset Management are launching a trio of cryptocurrency-focused exchange-traded funds even as investors pull back from spot Bitcoin funds.】

item.title: 交易商追踪议会政治，塞内加尔债券表现出色
item.description: 周二，由于投资者密切关注塞内加尔的政治动态，该国的美元债券表现优于新兴市场和前沿市场。【原文：Senegal’s dollar bonds outperformed emerging and frontier markets on Tuesday as investors closely followed political developments in the country.】

item.title: 加纳寻求将可可收购价提高 65%以遏制走私
item.description: 加纳可可行业监管机构正在协商，将本月初开始的可可收获季节支付给农民的可可价格提高 65%，以遏制走私。【原文：Ghana’s cocoa industry regulator is negotiating to raise the price it pays farmers for their cocoa by 65% for the season that started at the beginning of this month in a bid to curb smuggling.】

item.title: 阿波罗与道富合作的私人信贷 ETF 破土动工
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is working on its first exchange-traded fund, linking up with State Street Corp. on an offering that will include private credit investments.】

item.title: 隧道车祸导致通勤延误，新泽西州至纽约市巴士延误
item.description: 周二上午，新泽西公交公司的公交车在林肯隧道发生车祸，导致前往纽约市的乘客严重延误。【原文：New Jersey Transit buses are experiencing major delays Tuesday morning after a crash in the Lincoln Tunnel ensnared commuters traveling into New York City.】

item.title: TC 能源公司的天然气管道交易因结构问题而推迟
item.description: 管道运营商 TC Energy Corp. 推迟向一个土著投资集团出售加拿大西部天然气管道系统的少数股权。【原文：Pipeline operator TC Energy Corp. delayed the sale of a minority interest in a natural gas pipeline system in western Canada to an Indigenous investment group.】

item.title: 全球首个转基因小麦在美国获批后变得 "更加真实
item.description: 阿根廷的一家作物开发商是首家获得美国转基因小麦批准的公司，该公司表示，将该技术推向市场需要数年时间。【原文：An Argentine crop developer that is the first to receive US approval for genetically modified wheat said it will take years to bring the technology to market.】

item.title: 股价暴跌，Nvidia 的 Blackwell 芯片延迟成为焦点
item.description: 紧张的英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）投资者迫切希望了解其推出 Blackwell 芯片的最新进展；希望能有催化剂阻止该股近期的跌势。【原文：Nervous Nvidia Corp. investors are eager for an update on its Blackwell chip rollout — hoping for a catalyst to halt the stock’s recent decline.】

item.title: 加拿大银行称全球贸易变化可能推动物价上涨
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）表示，全球贸易趋势的变化有可能在未来造成更多的供应冲击，有可能推高价格，增加通胀的波动性。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem said shifting trends in global trade are likely to create more supply shocks in the future, potentially driving up prices and adding volatility to inflation.】

item.title: 马杜罗摧毁委内瑞拉的美元储备，对政权构成新威胁
item.description: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗自宣布赢得 7 月份的总统选举以来，一直受到世界各国政府的谴责，成为大规模街头抗议活动的目标，并遭到一些最亲密盟友的唾弃。【原文：Since declaring himself the winner of July’s presidential vote, Venezuela’s Nicolás Maduro has been condemned by governments across the world, targeted by massive street protests and spurned by some of his closest allies.】

item.title: 8 月份美国在线食品杂货价格创历史最高跌幅
item.description: 美国消费者的食品杂费可能终于得到了一些缓解，尤其是如果他们在网上购买食品的话。【原文：US consumers may finally be getting some relief from their grocery bills — especially if they shop for food online.】

item.title: 美国天然气交易商将祈祷一个寒冷的冬天
item.description:
期货价格较一年前下跌了 16%，大幅冻结将为多头带来可喜的缓解。【原文：

With futures 16% lower than a year ago, a big freeze would bring welcome relief for the bulls.

】

item.title: 宝马下调 2024 年展望，欧洲汽车股延续跌势
item.description: 由于零部件供应问题，欧洲最大的汽车公司之一宝马下调了今年的业绩展望，欧洲汽车制造商的股票延续了2024年的跌势。【原文：Shares in European automakers extended their 2024 decline after one of the sector’s biggest companies, BMW, cut its outlook for the year due to component supply issues.】

item.title: 津巴布韦 ZiG 货币兑美元创最长连跌纪录
item.description: 自 4 月 8 日开始交易以来，津巴布韦的金银支持货币兑美元汇率正在经历最长的连续下跌。【原文：Zimbabwe’s bullion-backed currency is experiencing its longest run of losses against the dollar since it started trading on April 8.】

item.title: 瑞银张志伟转为看跌，认为上证 500 指数将下跌 10
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS AG）的美国股票衍生品高级策略师表示，她预计一个月内 S&P 500 指数将从峰值下跌至少 10%。【原文：UBS AG’s top strategist for US equity derivatives said she’s expecting the S&P 500 to fall at least 10% from its peak within a month.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德向绿色燃料制造商 Infinium 投资 11 亿美元
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）将向低碳电子燃料初创企业 Infinium 投资高达 11 亿美元。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. is investing up to $1.1 billion in the low-carbon e-fuels startup Infinium.】

item.title: 法国债券遭遇日本现金外流，彰显脆弱性
item.description: 日本投资者在 7 月份大举抛售法国主权债券，这表明欧洲最安全的资产之一在一些最大的持有者眼中已经黯然失色。【原文：Japanese investors sold French sovereign bonds en masse in July, a sign that one of Europe’s safest assets has been tarnished in the eyes of some of its biggest holders.】

item.title: 全球金融之都是人工智能的无人区
item.description: 如果您曾来过香港，并渴望方便地使用 ChatGPT 或 Claude 等机器人，您可能会大吃一惊。但首先...【原文：If you’re ever visiting Hong Kong and craving easy access to bots like ChatGPT or Claude, you might be surprised. But first...】

item.title: 欧洲需求令人担忧，油价价差大幅缩小
item.description: 由于欧洲炼油厂的需求疲软，欧洲与中东原油之间的价差在十天内缩小了一半以上。【原文：A closely watched spread that shows the price difference between Europe and Middle East crude has more than halved in the space of ten days as weaker demand from Europe’s oil refineries finally bites.】

item.title: 三星前高管因涉嫌为中国窃取技术被捕
item.description: 韩国警方逮捕了两名三星电子公司的前官员，他们涉嫌窃取价值超过 4.3 万亿韩元（32 亿美元）的技术，用于在中国建造一家山寨芯片制造厂。【原文：South Korean police have arrested two former Samsung Electronics Co. officials on suspicion of stealing technologies worth more than 4.3 trillion won ($3.2 billion) to build a copycat chipmaking plant in China.】

item.title: 前道明投资银行主管 Pryde 加入 Forthlane 担任首席执行官
item.description: Forthlane Partners 聘用多伦多道明银行企业与投资银行部前主管 Robbie Pryde 担任首席执行官。【原文：Forthlane Partners recruited Robbie Pryde, the former head of corporate and investment banking at Toronto-Dominion Bank, as chief executive officer.】

item.title: 故障部件引发召回事件后，宝马削减指导计划
item.description: 宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）下调了今年的业绩展望，称由于一家供应商的制动系统存在故障，导致公司召回了 150 万辆汽车。【原文：BMW AG cut its outlook for the year, saying a faulty braking system from a supplier prompted the recall of 1.5 million vehicles.】
